item.title: Local semi-pro soccer team Sarasota Paradise clinch playoff berth
item.description: The Sarasota Paradise are coming off of a victory that saw them score 16 goals and not give up any. The win also clinched a postseason berth this year’s team.

item.description: If you recognize either individual, please contact police.

item.title: Woman dies in two-car crash in Englewood
Veterans to be first in line at Sarasota County job fair
item.description: The event will take place from 10 a.m. to 3 p.m. on Thursday, July 24.

item.title: First Alert Weather: Mostly dry at the coast with inland storms
item.description: Mostly inland storms are expected Thursday.

item.title: Sarasota assistant county administrator resigns amid stormwater fallout
item.description: Cunningham has served as assistant county administrator since 2012.

item.title: Caught on Camera: Lee County deputies pull couple from burning home
item.description: Body camera video captured the scene as deputies rushed to the blaze.

item.title: Permanent tax relief on emergency supplies begins August 1st
item.description: Permanent tax relief on emergency supplies begins August 1st.

item.title: Rain chances increase Friday, wet pattern sets in this weekend
item.description: Friday will be a transition day, with more widespread storms, but still mostly inland.

item.title: Four charged with carjacking at gunpoint in Manatee County
item.description: The Manatee County Sheriff’s Office announced the arrest of four people after allegedly stealing a man’s car using his own gun after a trip to the beach on July 8.

item.title: Water quality advisory issued for North Lido Beach due to bacteria
item.description: There is an increased risk of illness to swimmers, local health officials said.
